ai-tha-ap236:1.3_0: in the world the flame of lightning.
ai-tha-ap236:2.1_0: I worship the world with its gods,
ai-tha-ap236:2.3_0: The Lord of the World, after showing the Buddha,
ai-tha-ap236:3.1_0: if he makes his four eons;
ai-tha-ap236:3.3_0: I’m not aware of any living creatures.
ai-tha-ap236:3.4_0: this is the opportunity for fruit.
ai-tha-ap236:4.2_0: I took up the kingdom with the noble ones,
ai-tha-ap236:6.1_0: That is how these verses were recited by the senior venerable Sañjaya.
